p: 7-Nitro-1,2,3,4-tetrahydro-2-naphthalenamine (130 mg, 0.68 mmol) was acylated with TFAA (191 µL, 1.4 mmol) in a manner similar to that described in Example 54, Step A in 90% yield, and subsequently reduced to the corresponding aniline as described in Example 54, Step B in 99% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO- d 6) δ 9.39 (d, J = 7.7 Hz, 1 H), 6.70 (d, J = 7.8 Hz, 1 H), 6.33 (dd, J = 8.1, 2.4 Hz, 1 H), 6.23 (s, 1 H), 4.78 (s, 2 H), 3.97-3.87 (m, 1 H), 2.79-2.58 (m, 4 H), 1.91-1.84 (m, 1 H), 1.69-1.59 (m, 1 H); ES-LC/MS (M+H) + = 259.16.
